item.title: Forget The Electric State, Stanley Tucciâ€™s Upcoming Guy Ritchie Action Movie Is His Most Exciting 2025 Release
item.description: Stanley Tucci plays a starring role in Netflix's big-budget movie The Electric State, but he also has a Guy Ritchie adventure thriller coming up.

item.title: The Electric State's Robots Are By Far The Thing I Liked Most About The Movie, And These 8 Are Definitely The Best
item.description: Although The Electric State features many fascinating robot characters throughout its runtime, eight stood out for me a lot more than the others.

item.title: Anne Hathaway's Upcoming Sci-Fi Movie Release Delayed By 5 Months
item.description: Anne Hathaway has numerous movies in the works, including a science-fiction film whose release date has now been delayed by five months.
